title: Jan Middendorp
content:
Jan Middendorp is a Dutch page maker and type writer, living in Berlin, Germany.  
He was a literature and theater critic, DJ and b-2-b copywriter before that.  
First type interviews: [Rudy Vanderlans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rudy%20Vanderlans) (1987, de Volkskrant, NL), [Neville Brody](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Neville%20Brody) (1988, MAN Magazine, NL).

Books:  
Moving Minds (1999)  
Lettered (about Clotilde Olyff, 2000)  
Ha, daar gaat er een van mij! Graphic design in The Hague since 1945 (2002)  
Dutch Type (2004)  
ARK/ABC (about and with René Knip, 2004)  
Made with FontFont (with [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%20Spiekermann), 2006)  
A Line of Type (about Linotype, with [Alessio Leonardi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alessio%20Leonardi), 2006)  
Area 2 (co-curator, 2008)  
TypeBookTwo – Jeremy Tankard (contributor, 2008)  
José Mendoza y Almeida (foreword, translations, 2010)  
Playul Type 2 (co-author, 2010)  
Creative Characters (co-author, 2010)  
Precursor (co-author, 2011)  
Type Navigator (with TwoPoints.Net, 2011)  
I Love Gill Sans (introduction to a book ed. by TwoPoints.Net, 2012)  
Shaping Text / De Vorm van Tekst (2012)  
Hand to Type (2012)

Design magazines:  
Eye (London) – contributor since 2004  
Druk ( [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop) Benelux, Gent) – founding editor and art director, 1999-2002; "96" (same), 2002-2004  
Other collaborations have included Items (Amsterdam), tipoGrafica (Buenos Aires), TYPO (Prague), Typographic (London), Etapes (Paris), Matrix (Bad Homburg), Baseline (Kent).

Design:  
Brochures, programmes and booklets for Belgian clients in the academic and cultural worlds (De Beweeging, Antwerp; University of Leuven; the City of Ghent Culture Dept., etc. (1990s)  
Books and book covers for Lannoo Publishers, Belgium (2000–2013)  
Catalogues for VOUS ETES ICI Gallery, Amsterdam (2003–2008)

Current and recent clients:  
 [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MyFonts), [LucasFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/LucasFonts), [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype), [FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011115125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontShop), BIS Publishers, Gestalten Publishers
